title: Ping spikes from 18 to 400-600
body: I usually have a normal ping of 18 but lately its jumping all over in the 400 then back to 18 and sometimes 600 ping. my frame rate is normal for me but the ping just spikes from no where

replies.body: It sounds like you've got some network issues like packet loss causing you to have these spikes.  You can use a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to know for sure.  I recommend using the steps found in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection and resolve this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Thanks :) I did that and also did a full repair just now
